message: I can't believe Mortal Kombat cost so little. I mean, I guess you can SEE that it was cheap, but I still think of it as a guilty pleasure.

I saw Mortal Kombat in the old Muizenberg cinema early one morning after pulling 2 or 3 consecutive all-nighters. The two guys who were with me were, frankly, tequila'd up to the eyeballs.

It's the funniest flick I ever did see.
